title: IMPORTED_VERSION
description: Versions whose content is an ORIGINAL_VERSION copied from another location; this class inherits commit_audit and contribution from VERSION<T>, providing imported versions with their own audit trail and Contribution, distinct from those of the imported ORIGINAL_VERSION.
$comments: Defined in Common IM, inherits from VERSION

contribution.description: Contribution in which this version was added.

signature.description: OpenPGP digital signature or digest of content committed in this Version.

commit_audit.description: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this version to the VERSIONED_OBJECT.

item.description: The ORIGINAL_VERSION object that was imported.

uid.description: Computed version of inheritance precursor, derived as item.uid.

preceding_version_uid.description: Computed version of inheritance precursor, derived as item.preceding_version_uid.

lifecycle_state.description: Lifecycle state of the content item in wrapped ORIGINAL_VERSION, derived as item.lifecycle_state.

canonical_form.description:
Canonical form of Version object, created by serialising all attributes except 
signature.

owner_id.description: Copy of the owning VERSIONED_OBJECT.uid value; extracted from the local uid property's object_id.

is_branch.description: True if this Version represents a branch. Derived from uid attribute.

$invariants.Lifecycle_state_ valid: lifecycle_state /= Void and then terminology (Term_id_openehr).has_code_for_group_id (Group_id_version_lifecycle_state, lifecycle_state.defining_code)
